data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides access to telescope parameters such as
    location, altitude and mechanical limits. These are necessary to
    determine whether an astronomical target can be observed. Over 70
    telescopes are currently supported.

    There is no module on CPAN that provides this functionality (this
    module used to be part of my Astro::Coords module but has now been
    spun off since it makes more sense to be distinct from a coordinate
    transformation distribution).
